Northland supermarket deal falls through after liquor licence objectionshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-supermarket-deal-falls-through-after-liquor-licence-objections/MW6O52WR5NCSZGXNN5OE3UE5IM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-supermarket-deal-falls-through-after-liquor-licence-objections/MW6O52WR5NCSZGXNN5OE3UE5IM/ Jenny LingThe tenants of a proposed supermarket backed out after objections to the liquor licence.
